Don’t worry, Charles is perfectly happy chasing after bugs by himself.

Great. That means you’ve come to the

right place, Charles.

Oh?

What?

This is the house

of Reverend Henslow,

a botany professor. He

always welcomes any student

who has an interest in

natural history.

Oh,

Professor Henslow!

I’ve heard a lot about him.

He apparently has a vast knowledge of entomology, chemistry, mineralogy

and geology.

You’re right.

That’s Professor

Henslow over

there.

Ah…
